attributes.action: Abolish car park charging and wheelclamping in the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I Hereby request this Petition to support our case for the Abolition of Car Park Charges and Wheel clamping in the NHS.
Unfair laws and changes for mercantile profit cause disharmony and misery and have no place in a modern civilised society. 
As a further suggestion, I would like everybody to ask the canvassers and candidates at the next election to consider; Paying car park charges at NHS hospitals can cost £50 a week to visiting family and friends and can cause unnecessary hardship most can ill afford.
There is no moral reason for these charges, it is Blatant Exploitation for Profit and must be abolished.
Most Important, remind MP’s and Councillors; “They will not get Our Vote unless They Support our Petition".

Stop This Imoral Expoitation

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
